title: Treatment With Acetyl-Choline Esterase Inhibitors in Children With Autism

operands.value: A formal diagnosis of Autism or Pervasive Developmental Disorder not otherwise specified (PDD-NOS), given by a child neurologist
Must have minimum age of 10 Years
Must have maximum age of 18 Years
Evidence for an underlying infectious disease
Evidence for specific brain related disorder (such as tuberous sclerosis)
Evidence for history of fetal cytomegalovirus infection
Evidence for a history of major head injury
Evidence for a chronic use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, (NSAID)
Use of psychostimulants, anti-depressants, neuroleptics or anti-convulsive agents within the past month
Lack of cooperation in the screening phase

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('A formal diagnosis of Autism or Pervasive Developmental Disorder not otherwise specified (PDD-NOS), given by a child neurologist'), Symbol('A signed parental consent form'), Symbol('Age: 10-18 years'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 10 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('Abnormal Electro-cardiogram (ECG)'), Symbol('Epilepsy'), Symbol('Epileptiform EEG'), Symbol('Evidence for a chronic use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, (NSAID)'), Symbol('Evidence for a history of major head injury'), Symbol('Evidence for an underlying infectious disease'), Symbol('Evidence for birth asphyxia'), Symbol('Evidence for chromosomal abnormality'), Symbol('Evidence for history of fetal cytomegalovirus infection'), Symbol('Evidence for known brain damage'), Symbol('Evidence for metabolic disorder'), Symbol('Evidence for specific brain related disorder (such as tuberous sclerosis)'), Symbol('Lack of cooperation in the screening phase'), Symbol('Use of psychostimulants, anti-depressants, neuroleptics or anti-convulsive agents within the past month'))))
